mapper.select: select * from ( select grouplist.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rnum from grouplist where start_date < #{value} and #{value} < end_date) where rnum <= 2
select * from ( select lesson.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rnum from lesson where start_date < #{value} and #{value} < end_date) where rnum <= 2
select g.writer_name, g.hobby_type, g.location, g.location_lat, g.location_lng, m.profile, m.id from grouplist g inner join member m on g.writer_id = m.id and g.location = #{value}
